thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 22 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Wayfair Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.83

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Wayfair Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.83
text:
Feb 22 (Reuters) - Wayfair Inc:
* WAYFAIR ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS
* Q4 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.58
* Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.83 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 46.2 PERCENT TO $1.439 BILLION * NUMBER OF ACTIVE CUSTOMERS IN OUR DIRECT RETAIL BUSINESS REACHED 11.0 MILLION AS OF DECEMBER 31, 2017, AN INCREASE OF 33.2% YEAR OVER YEAR
* ORDERS DELIVERED IN Q4 2017 WERE 6.2 MILLION, UP 31.3% YEAR OVER YEAR
* LTM NET REVENUE PER ACTIVE CUSTOMER WAS $422 AS OF DEC 31, 2017, UP 6.8% YEAR OVER YEAR Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
